titleStmt.title: Jack the plough-lads lamentation his master has forsaken the plough and the cart, which grieves poor Iack unto the heart, for night and day he doth sorely complain, and doth wish that his master would come home again.
titleStmt.author: Robins, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Author's name suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faint print with slight loss of text.
"To the tune of, Prentices fuddle no more."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
